description: Updates AttendeeCapabilities except the capabilities listed in an ExcludedAttendeeIds table. When using capabilities, be aware of these corner cases:

parameters.name: MeetingId
parameters.description: The ID of the meeting associated with the update request.

parameters.name: ExcludedAttendeeIds
parameters.description: The AttendeeIDs that you want to exclude from one or more capabilities. (dict) --- A structure that contains one or more attendee IDs. A list of one or more attendee IDs.

nested_params.name: AttendeeId
nested_params.description: A list of one or more attendee IDs.

parameters.name: Capabilities
parameters.description: The capabilities ( audio, video, or content) that you want to update. The audio capability assigned to an attendee. The video capability assigned to an attendee. The content capability assigned to an attendee.

nested_params.name: Audio
nested_params.description: The audio capability assigned to an attendee.

nested_params.name: Video
nested_params.description: The video capability assigned to an attendee.

nested_params.name: Content
nested_params.description: The content capability assigned to an attendee.
